amendment.description: At the end of division D (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act (including title IV and title VIII) may be used to carry out the Reproductive Health Non-Discrimination Amendment Act of 2014 (D.C. Law 20-261) or to implement any rule or regulation promulgated to carry out such Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 192 printed in House Report 115-297 to prohibit funds from being used to implement the District of Columbia's Reproductive Health Non-Discrimination Amendment Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A160) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 194 (Roll no. 518).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A160) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 194 (Roll no. 518).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A160) offered by Mr. Palmer.
